name: Ganbare Pikamee!
description:
A free fan made game remembering some of the many wonderful moments of Amano Pikamee's career. Wishing her the best luck on all her future endeavors.

This game is completely free and all credit goes to the artists, clippers, and authors of any material inside.

Features:
- An in game jukebox 10 songs performed by Pikamee.
- 25 clips from a variety of streams involving Pikamee.
- 37 collectable items.
- Intense Beloved Wooden Spatula to Destructible Vase combat action!
